brewery.brewery_description:
Monty's Brewery is a multi award winning brewery based near Montgomery, Powys, in the heart of Mid Wales. 
Brewers of great beers, with a range of gluten free beers also. From Golden Ales to Stouts, Barley Wine and Imperial stouts, there is something for everyone!

beer.beer_description: A chestnut coloured, malty dark ale. An easy drinking, rich, amber coloured Best Bitter; full of malty character. CAMRA Champion Bitter of Wales 2016 & Bronze Champion Beer of Wales 2016

items.badge_description: Whether you’re feeling extra special or extra strong, stopping by the local pub for a delicious Extra Special / Strong Bitter or English Bitter is always a good decision! That's 75 different beers with the style of Extra Special / Strong Bitter or English Bitter. Try 5 more for Level 16!

beer.beer_description: Special edition

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 160 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 33!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 85 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 18!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 135 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 28.

While small, the brewing tradition of Wales is quite robust. As early as the 6th century the country began to form its very own distinct styles. That's 10 different beers from a brewery from Wales. Try 5 more for Level 3!

Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 365 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more for Level 74!

beer.beer_description: Smooth easy drinking.

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 285 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 58!

items.badge_name: Beyond a Shadow of a Stout (Level 15)
items.badge_description: We all love Stouts, and now we have a dedicated badge to celebrate your dedication to these dark, top-fermented beer in multiple variations, like Oatmeal, Milk and more! Which one will you start with? That's 75 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 16!

beer.beer_description:
Monty's Sunshine 4.2% is a gloriously hoppy, floral, golden ale with a refreshing tang and dry finish. 

Winner of the Darlington Spring Thing Beer festival 2009. SIBA regional winner 2011 - Silver (Best Bitters)
2014 - Silver Medal winner at CAMRA's Great Welsh Beer & Cider Festival
2014 - 2 Gold Stars at The Great Taste Awards.
Special edition

items.badge_description: Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 105 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 22!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 135 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 28!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 175 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 36! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

beer.beer_description: A chestnut coloured, malty dark ale. An easy drinking, rich, amber coloured Best Bitter; full of malty character. CAMRA Champion Bitter of Wales 2016 & Bronze Champion Beer of Wales 2016
Smooth easy drinking.
Smooth easy drinking.

user.bio: All hail to the ale, enjoy drinking & sampling beers (hic) lol .be it dark/light/amber/pale/golden/milds/stout or porter

Which one will you start with? That's 145 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 30!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 120 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 25!

Monty's Sunshine 4.2% is a gloriously hoppy, floral, golden ale with a refreshing tang and dry finish. 

Winner of the Darlington Spring Thing Beer festival 2009. SIBA regional winner 2011 - Silver (Best Bitters)
2014 - Silver Medal winner at CAMRA's Great Welsh Beer & Cider Festival

items.badge_description: Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 15 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 4!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 50 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 11.

beer.beer_description:
Monty's Sunshine 4.2% is a gloriously hoppy, floral, golden ale with a refreshing tang and dry finish. 

Winner of the Darlington Spring Thing Beer festival 2009. SIBA regional winner 2011 - Silver (Best Bitters)
2014 - Silver Medal winner at CAMRA's Great Welsh Beer & Cider Festival
2014 - 2 Gold Stars at The Great Taste Awards.

Rich Oatmeal Stout.
Brewed to remove gluten
Multi Award winning 
3 Great Taste Gold Stars 2017 & 2018. Highest awarded beer in Great British Food Awards 2020
Strong, Golden, Refreshing IPA. Brewed with a great balance of malts and hops this beer is an easy drinking brew with a slight sweetness in the finish.
A premium golden bitter with the amazing tropical fruit flavours and it's certified gluten free
A chestnut coloured, malty dark ale. An easy drinking, rich, amber coloured Best Bitter; full of malty character. CAMRA Champion Bitter of Wales 2016 & Bronze Champion Beer of Wales 2016
Crisp, Dry, Golden Ale.
Dry, Lightly Hopped, Pale Ale. Brewed to carry a grapefruit aroma and a hint of lychee this is a quaffable, easy drinking pint.

Monty's famous summer blonde ale. Very dry with lovely citrus notes...
 
Each year, 5p from every pint sold will be donated to SSAFA; who provide support for UK Forces & Families.
Special edition
This is a 8% Barley Wine, with a taste that belies its strength. Smooth with a hint of sweetness in the finish, it'll knock your socks off without warning...CAMRA Champion Barley Wine of Wales 2016
Hoppy, fruity, clean, smooth
Winter warming ESB, with lots of crystal malts there is a nice malty charachter, a hint of sweetness and nuttiness.

A limited edition 9% Imperial Stout. A dark , rich, and balanced Imperial Stout, packed with vanilla, chocolate and hints of burnt wood flavours. Gentle aroma of liquorice, very smooth to the palette.

Only 1600 bottles have been produced so one for the special occasions.
Malty flavour, deep red colour and a slight hoppy hit at the end.
Monty's sporting celebration ale. Only 3.4% produced and throughout the year to coincide with major sporting occasions.
Golden Premium Bitter. This is the first brew in Monty's new Craft Keg range.
Dark, Rich & Smooth with great flavours. This is the second beer in Monty's NEW Craft Keg range.
Smooth easy drinking.
